content:
# I successfully harvested 10 iron ore, and my inventory now reflects the following items:
# - 4 transport belts
# - 2 stone bricks
# - 8 stones
# - 10 iron ore
# - 5 iron plates
# - 3 copper plates
# - 2 iron gear wheels
# - 2 electronic circuits

# With the iron ore collected, I can now proceed to smelt it into iron plates using the stone furnace. 

# I will place the stone furnace if it is not already placed, and then insert the iron ore and fuel (coal) into it for smelting.

# First, I will ensure that I have a stone furnace available in my inventory.

ensure_craftable(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Ensure I have a stone furnace available.
furnace_position = nearest_buildable(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Find a valid position to place the furnace.
move_to(furnace_position)  # Move to the position where I will place the furnace.
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=furnace_position)  # Place the stone furnace.
